mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mm_m_pub (id, pub_set_hash, provider_id, ext_id, int_id, version, pub, operator_id, begin_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{pubSetHash}, #{providerId}, #{extId}, #{extId}, #{version}, #{publication}, #{operatorId}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: SELECT id, pub_set_hash, provider_id, ext_id, int_id, version, pub, operator_id, begin_time FROM mm_m_pub WHERE pub_ext_id = #{pubExtId} AND end_time IS NULL
SELECT COUNT(mpub.id) FROM mm_m_pub mpub WHERE mpub.pub_set_hash = #{pubSetHash} AND mpub.end_time IS NULL
